inventories.description: A module that switches the contents of player inventories.
inventories.enabled: You will have a separate inventory for every preset.
inventories.disabled: You will have a shared inventory across all presets.
inventories.warning: All items not currently present in your inventory will be IMMEDIATELY lost!

ender_chests.description: A module that switches the contents of player ender chests.
ender_chests.enabled: You will have a separate ender chest for every preset.
ender_chests.disabled: You will have a shared ender chest across all presets.
ender_chests.warning: All ender chest contents not currently in your ender chest will be lost!

experience.description: A module that switches player levels and experience.
experience.enabled: You will have separate levels and experience per-preset.
experience.disabled: You will share levels and experience across all presets.
experience.warning: All experience not currently on your hotbar will be lost!

trinkets.description: A module that switches the contents of player trinket slots.
trinkets.enabled: You will have a separate trinket slots for every preset.
trinkets.disabled: You will share a trinket slots (and their contents) across all presets.
trinkets.warning: All trinkets equipped on other presets will be IMMEDIATELY lost!
